Context: The text discusses FacultyConnect, an online hub of videos created by George Brown College faculty to share practices for fostering student well-being in the classroom. Research is emphasized as showing a strong connection between student well-being and academic success, learning, and retention. The collection of short videos provides tools and ideas for creating supportive learning environments, with categories including student perspectives on well-being and learning. This project is supported by George Brown College's Healthy Campus Initiative, Employee Learning & Development, and Retention Initiative. For more information or to sign up, contact ask.george@georgebrown.ca or visit their social media hub. The phone number provided is 416-415-2000 with a TTY number of 1-877-515-5559. The text also includes a disclaimer that the information on the website may change without notice and should not be viewed as a representation or warranty, and students are responsible for verifying college fee requirements. No explicit mention of specific programs offered by the college is made in the text.
